subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The long-hitting rookie Dustin Johnson won the Turning Stone Resort Championship for his first PGA Tour title, holing an 8-foot birdie putt on the final hole for a three-under-par 69 and a one-stroke victory over Robert Allenby.
snippet: The long-hitting rookie Dustin Johnson won the Turning Stone Resort Championship for his first PGA Tour title, holing an 8-foot birdie putt on the final hole for a three-under-par 69 and a one-stroke victory over Robert Allenby.
